name: Reef Light Conundrum
description:
⚫ Reef Light Conundrum is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation mixing themes of the paranormal & lovecraftian horror.

⚫ A 90s VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of exploring a old haunted ship.

Key Features ⚫ Explore the ship as events unfold unlock multiple endings and utilize your camera mechanics including sepia cam mode, limited blitz mechanic and B/W cam mode to unveil the paranormal world, the past and its secrets.

Story ⚫ Explore a abandoned rusty fishing trawler ship rumored to be haunted after all the people onboard died due to mysterious circumstances. The ship has been decaying for 50 years and you must now proceed with your urban exploration to uncover it's past.

⚫Features
  • Realistic urban exploration simulation feeling
  • B/W camera mode to unveil secrets, the past and the paranormal 
  • Sepia camera mode
  • Limited blitz mechanic
  • Ghost puzzles
  • Melee combat and enemies
  • Realistic audio design
  • No hand holding, non-linear exploration
  • 2 Possible endings
  • Randomized audio design, thunder system and event system
  • Discover lore through ghost puzzles and journals
⚫Controls
  • Movement = WASD
  • RUN = Left shift
  • CROUCH = Left ctrl CRAWL = C
  • EXAMINE NEWSPAPER / OBJECT = Q READ = E
  • ZOOM WITH CAMERA = Right mouse button
  • CAMERA B/W MODE = F
  • LIMITED CAMERA FLASH BLITZ = G
  • SEPIA CAMERA MODE = R = Activate  | T = deactivate
  • INTERACT =  Press E
  • Best played in 1920x1080 resolution
  • You can adjust quality settings inside the game through ESC > Options
  • You can view / edit controls inside the game through ESC > Controls

The game only supports Keyboard&Mouse .

WARNING: This game contains gore as well as flashing lights etc. which could trigger a seizure in some, play at your own risk.
